name: pygeoapi
description: pygeoapi is a Python server implementation of the OGC API suite of standards.
full_description: # pygeoapi [![Build Status](https://github.com/geopython/pygeoapi/workflows/build%20%E2%9A%99%EF%B8%8F/badge.svg)](https://github.com/geopython/pygeoapi/actions) [pygeoapi](https://pygeoapi.io) is a Python server implementation of the [OGC API](https://ogcapi.ogc.org) suite of standards. The project emerged as part of the next generation OGC API efforts in 2018 and provides the capability for organizations to deploy a RESTful OGC API endpoint using OpenAPI, GeoJSON, and HTML. pygeoapi is [open source](https://opensource.org/) and released under an [MIT license](https://github.com/geopython/pygeoapi/blob/master/LICENSE.md). Please read the docs at [https://docs.pygeoapi.io](https://docs.pygeoapi.io) for more information.
